titleStmt.title: Sir Thomas Roe his speech in Parliament wherein he sheweth the cause of the decay of coyne and trade in this land, especially of merchants trade, and also propoundeth a vvay to the House, how they may be increased.

titleStmt.author: Roe, Thomas, Sir, 1581?-1644.
